description: Located next to the East River, this newly renovated 1 bedroom apt is in the heart of the Upper East Side of Manhattan. Walking distance from Central Park, top-rated restaurants, art galleries and more!
name: Upper East Side Newly Renovated One Bedroom
review:
Very nice place on the Upper East Side. Very easy checkin and James was very flexible. Place is clean and host provided free coffee and fresh towels. Apartment is very close to some nice restaraunts and eateries. 

Highly recommend this place.
